mapper.select: select * from user,usergroup left join exam on exam.groupId=usergroup.groupId left join examhistory on usergroup.userId=examhistory.userId and examhistory.examId=exam.examId where exam.examId=#{examId} and user.userId=usergroup.userId order by examhistory.examCompletionQuestionTotals+examhistory.examChoiceQuestionTotals+examhistory.examProgrammingTotals DESC

SELECT user.userId,user.userName,examhistory.examChoiceQuestionTotals,examhistory.examProgrammingTotals,exam.examId,exam.examName, examhistory.examCompletionQuestionTotals,examhistory.examChoiceQuestionTotals+examhistory.examProgrammingTotals+examhistory.examCompletionQuestionTotals as total FROM examhistory,user,exam where examhistory.examId =exam.examId and user.userId=examhistory.userId and user.userId=#{userId} order by total desc
select * from examhistory where userId=#{userId} and examId=#{examId}

select count(*) as examUser,count(if(examhistory.examId is NULL,1,null)) as examNotSubmitUser ,count(*)-count(if(examhistory.examId is NULL,1,null)) as examSubmitUser from usergroup left join examhistory on usergroup.userId=examhistory.userId and examhistory.examId=#{examId} left join exam on exam.groupId=usergroup.groupId where exam.examId=#{examId}

SELECT ifnull(SUM(examChoiceQuestionResultScore),'1111') FROM examchoicequestionhistory,examquestion where examId=#{examId} and examquestion.examQuestionId=examchoicequestionhistory.examQuestionId and userId=#{userId};

SELECT ifnull(SUM(examCompletionQuestionResultScore),'1111') FROM examcompletionquestionhistory,examquestion where examId=#{examId} and examquestion.examQuestionId=examcompletionquestionhistory.examQuestionId and userId=#{userId};

SELECT ifnull(SUM(examProgrammingQuestionResultScore),'1111') FROM examprogrammingquestionhistory,examquestion where examId=#{examId} and examquestion.examQuestionId=examprogrammingquestionhistory.examQuestionId and userId=#{userId};
